data.name: BinaryStringError
data.value: When using the prefix "0b", ensure the string only contains bit values (0 and 1).

data.name: BitNumberParseError
data.value: Failed to parse the bit number for {0} variable {1}: {2}.

data.name: CallingSatSolverWithParametersString
data.value: Calling SAT solver at {0} with parameters {1}.

data.name: CbmcOutputStreamTooltip
data.value: Redirect the output of the CBMC process.

data.name: CbmcProcessError
data.value: CBMC process returned with an error.

data.name: CbmcProcessKillException
data.value: Killing CBMC process threw an exception: {0} {1}.

data.name: CbmcProcessReturnedSuccessfully
data.value: CBMC process returned successfully after {0} seconds.

data.name: CiphertextEncodingError
data.value: Encoding of the ciphertext bits returned with an error.

data.name: CnfFileTooltip
data.value: Choose filename for saving the resulting CNF.

data.name: FixBitsTooltip
data.value: Check for the option to fix some bits.

data.name: FixedBitsEncodingError
data.value: Encoding of the fixed bits returned with an error.

data.name: FixedBitsEncodingHint
data.value: Only use the characters '0', '1' and '*' to fix bits, the character {0} is not allowed.

data.name: FixedBitsEncodingStrangeError
data.value: Something went wrong in the function encodeFixedBitsInCnf (this code should never be reached).

data.name: FixedBitsSizeError
data.value: The amount of fixed bits should be less or equal to the amount of input bits{0}Fixed bits: {1} bits{0}Input bits: {2} bits{0}The fixed bits are truncated to the size of the input bits from least significant bit to most significant bit.

data.name: FixedBitsTooltip
data.value: Fix an arbitrary number of input bits.

data.name: FixedBitsWarning
data.value: The fix bits option was selected but no bits were fixed.

data.name: HashEncodingError
data.value: Hash encoding returned with an error.

data.name: HexStringError
data.value: When using the prefix "0x", ensure the string is an even amount of regular hexadecimal characters.

data.name: InputHashValueTooltip
data.value: Enter hash value for a preimage or second preimage attack (prefix "0x" for hexadecimal, "0b" for binary).

data.name: InputMessageTooltip
data.value: Provide a first preimage for a second preimage attack (prefix "0x" for hexadecimal, "0b" for binary).

data.name: InputSelectionTooltip
data.value: Select how the ANSI-C code is passed to the SAT Attack component.

data.name: InputStreamTooltip
data.value: Connect the input stream to a text input component which contains the ANSI-C code of a cryptographic function.

data.name: InputVariablesSizeFailureString
data.value: Failed to get the size of input variables.

data.name: LiteralParseError
data.value: Failed to parse the literal for {0} variable {1}:{2}.

data.name: MainFunctionTooltip
data.value: Specify the name of the main function if it is not "main()".

data.name: NotAHexCharError
data.value: The character {0} is not a valid hexadecimal character.

data.name: OnlyCnfOutputTooltip
data.value: Only translate ANSI-C code to CNF and encode the selected attack; do not solve with the SAT solver.

data.name: OutputSizeError
data.value: Ensure the specified output has the correct length{0}Hash value / ciphertext: {1} bits{0}Output: {2} bits.

data.name: OutputStreamTooltip
data.value: Writes status information and the result of the attack, if the attack was successful.

data.name: PlaintextEncodingError
data.value: Encoding of the plaintext bits returned with an error.

data.name: PlaintextPrefixInfoString
data.value: Ensure that the provided plaintext has the prefix "0x" or "0b".

data.name: PlaintextSizeError
data.value: Ensure the specified plaintext has the correct length (the amount of input bits must be larger than the amount of plaintext bits){0}Plaintext: {1} bits{0}Input: {2} bits.

data.name: PrefixError
data.value: Use the prefix "0x" for hexadecimal value or the prefix "0b" for binary value.

data.name: SatOutputProcessError
data.value: Processing of SAT solver output returned an error.

data.name: SatProcessKillException
data.value: Killing SAT solver process threw an exception: {0} {1}.

data.name: SatProcessReturnedSuccessful
data.value: SAT solver process returned successfully after {0} seconds.

data.name: SatProcessReturnedUnsat
data.value: SAT solver process returned after {0} seconds... but failed to find a solution.

data.name: SatSolverOutputFileError
data.value: SAT solver output file not found at {0}.

data.name: SatSolverOutputFirstLineError
data.value: First line in SAT solver output file {0} is not "SAT".

data.name: SatSolverOutputStreamTooltip
data.value: Redirect the output of the SAT solver process.

data.name: SatSolverReturnedWithExitcode
data.value: SAT solver process returned with exitcode {0}.

data.name: SecondPreimageEncodingError
data.value: Encoding of the second preimage bits returned with an error.

data.name: SecondPreimageSizeError
data.value: Ensure the specified second preimage has the correct length{0}Second preimage: {1} bits{0}Input: {2} bits.

data.name: UnassignedVariableWarning
data.value: Variable {0}_{1}:{2} does not appear in the {3} mapping. Is the Variable {0}_{1} used in the ANSI-C code? It will be assigned "false" by default.

data.name: VariableDefinitionsError
data.value: Make sure the {0} variable definitions start with {1}_0 and the indices are incremented steadily and each variable is actually used in the code.

data.name: VariableIndexParseError
data.value: Failed to parse the variable index for {0} variable {1}:{2}.

data.name: VariableNumberParsingFailedString
data.value: Failed to read number of {0} variables.

data.name: VariableSizeParsingFailedString
data.value: Failed to read size of {0} variables.

data.name: InputFoundStringKeyRecovery
data.value: Key-recovery attack: A key was found that fits to the provided plaintext and ciphertext:

data.name: InputFoundStringPreimage
data.value: Preimage attack: An input was found that fits to the provided hash value:

data.name: InputFoundStringSecondPreimage
data.value: Second preimage attack: An input was found that fits to the provided hash value and is different from the provided first preimage:

data.name: CbmcExeNotFound
data.value: Could not find the cbmc executable at {0}.

data.name: satSolverExeNotFound
data.value: Could not find the SAT solver executable at {0}.
